Catching Up

June 29, 2014

June was a rough month for me both professionally and personally. I moved and I had allot going on at work. Work pretty much tired me out. But things have sorta calmed down and I’m sorta back but not in full force. I’m changing my primary PHP framework from Fuel to Laravel while learning the Swift programming language. A few years ago I launched a couple of IOS apps. I made $7 bucks so I decided back then that building IOS apps aren’t for me. A few weeks ago a buddy of mine came up with a killer app idea, which I will dedicate most of my time to so don’t expect too many posts in the next couple of months.
